title: manasa ramuni
sahitya:
manasA rAmuni marakavE O

anupallavi

 munupaDi durguNa mulanu viDaciyati vinaya vidhEyuDavai vivEkamutO

caraNam 1

 bhaktA dhAruDu parama pAvanuDu bhakta vatsaluDu paramAtmuDu 
mukti dAyakuDu mOhana rUpuDu bhakti lEni mAnavulaku vimuguDu
 
caraNam 2

 dasharatha bAluDu dAnava kAluDu dashamukha daitya samhAruDu dhIruDu 
visatamugA bhakta citta vihAruDu rasikula vEgamE rakSincuvADu
 
caraNam 3

 shyAmaLa mEgha sundaruTati sUruDu rAmadAsa mAnasa sancAruDu 
rAmacandrapurA dhAruDu vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata varaduDu gAna
